resources.string: Enter a name for the new sheet.
Enter a new name for this sheet.
Are you sure you want to delete the sheet \"%1$s\"?\n\nThis cannot be undone.
Enter a name for the sketchbook.
Enter a new name for this sketchbook.
Are you sure you want to delete the sketchbook \"%1$s\"?\n\nThis cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to switch to internal storage?
Are you sure you want to switch to external storage?

WARNING: The external storage is read-only.

This means that you can open a sketchbook, but not make any changes to it.

Are you sure you want to switch anyway?
%1$s has detected that it did not exit properly last time. Your unsaved work may be recoverable.\n\nDo you want to attempt to recover your work?
The SD card has been removed. Either reinsert the SD card or switch to internal storage to avoid losing data.
A sheet already exists with that name.
Enter a name for the sheet.
You can\'t delete the last sheet.
The external storage can\'t be accessed.
The sketchbook cannot be saved. The external storage is read-only.

 literary or artistic work, or phonogram or performance and includes

 derived from the original, except that a work that constitutes a
 Collection will not be considered an Adaptation for the purpose of
 this License. For the avoidance of doubt, where the Work is a musical

 timed-relation with a moving image ("synching") will be considered an
